question: Hi.. I always feel weakness and acidity after every meal. I cannot eat dry food due to acidity. If I talk for long I get pain in my head and feel nautious. I work hard some time avoiding this weakness. I tested blood CBC and diabetes. but found negative. I feel very tired and strengthless after sex. At least two times everyday I need to go toilet.I am a 28yrs old male with 72 kgs weight and 5'7" height. I eat rice for all my three meals most of the times.Can you please give me suggestions what can I do?Regards.
title: Weakness
